      • startVideoStream

        public void startVideoStream(@NonNull
                             android.view.Surface surface,
                             java.lang.String tag,
                             @NonNull
                             android.os.Bundle videoProps,
                             AbstractCommandListener listener)
        Attempt to grab ownership and start the video stream from the connected drone. Can fail if the video stream is already owned by another client.
        Parameters:
        surface - Surface object onto which the video is decoded.
        tag - Video tag.
        videoProps - Non-null video properties. @see VIDEO_PROPS_UDP_PORT
        listener - Register a callback to receive update of the command execution status.
        Since:
        2.6.8

      • stopVideoStream

        public void stopVideoStream(java.lang.String tag,
                            AbstractCommandListener listener)
        Stop the video stream from the connected drone, and release ownership.
        Parameters:
        tag - Video tag.
        listener - Register a callback to receive update of the command execution status.
        Since:
        2.6.8
